name: burger
description: Full stack restaurant web application that allows a user to input the names of burgers they'd like to eat. Whenever a user submits a burger's name, the app will display the burger on the left side of the page -- waiting to be devoured. Each burger in the waiting area also has a Devour it! button. When the user clicks it, the burger will move to the right side of the page. Every burger is stored in a database, whether devoured or not.
